keyInfo.title: Visa Requirements
points: Indian travelers can enjoy visa-free entry to Thailand for stays up to 30 days.
Passport must be valid for at least 6 months from date of entry.

keyInfo.title: Currency
points: Official currency is Thai Baht (THB).
Credit and debit cards widely accepted in hotels and malls.
Carry some cash for local markets.

keyInfo.title: Best Time to Visit
points: November to April offers pleasant weather.
Ideal for island-hopping and sightseeing.

keyInfo.title: Language
points: Thai is the official language.
English widely spoken in tourist areas.

keyInfo.title: Local Transport
points: Tuk-tuks, taxis and local buses available.
Speedboats and ferries used for island travel.
Agree on fares before starting ride.

keyInfo.title: Dress Code
points: Beachwear allowed at resorts and islands.
Modest clothing recommended at temples.
Remove shoes before entering temples.

keyInfo.title: Safety & Etiquette
points: Thailand is generally safe for travelers.
Keep belongings safe in crowded places.
Respect monks and elders.

keyInfo.title: Time Zone
points: Thailand follows Indochina Time (ICT).
ICT is 1 hour 30 minutes ahead of India (IST +1.5 hrs).

keyInfo.title: Electricity
points: Standard voltage is 220V.
Two-prong round or flat plugs used.
Universal adapter recommended.

keyInfo.title: Emergency Numbers
points: Tourist Police: 1155
Ambulance: 1669
Fire: 199

termsAndConditions.title: Booking & Payments
points: Minimum booking amount required to confirm package.

termsAndConditions.title: Cancellation Policy
points: 30+ days before departure: 25% charge.
15–29 days before departure: 50% charge.
Less than 15 days: 100% charge.
No refund for unused services or no-shows.

termsAndConditions.title: Travel Documents & Visa
points: Traveler responsible for valid passport and visa.
Visa approval subject to embassy discretion.

termsAndConditions.title: Flights & Transfers
points: Airfare subject to dynamic pricing.
Fare increases to be borne by traveler.

termsAndConditions.title: Hotels & Accommodation
points: Subject to availability.
Similar category hotels may be provided.
Check-in/out as per hotel policy.

termsAndConditions.title: Responsibility & Liability
